trans-unit.source: Binds an activity's property to a property, field, indexer, method, event, or another activity's property.
This class cannot be inherited.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind> allows data to flow from one activity to another activity within a workflow.

<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind> is a declarative way of doing what otherwise must be accomplished using code, and therefore is a key element of most workflows that are written entirely in XAML markup.
<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind> represents a bind expression that has an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> member as a target.
The target activity member can be a property, an event, or a field.

An <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> property or method can use <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind> to bind to another <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity> member.

For example, if activity1 has property1 set to some value and if activity2 has its property1 set to <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind> with Name="activity1" and Path="property1", at run time the activity2.property1 gets its value from activity1.property1.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the class with the name parameter.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the class with name and path parameters.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
The path of the new <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.
Gets the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> representing the run-time value of this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that owns this bind.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> representing the run-time value of this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.
activity is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Gets the <xref href="System.Object"></xref> representing the run-time value of this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that owns this bind.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> of the object if a <xref href="System.Delegate"></xref>; otherwise a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
activity is null.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> representing the run-time value of this <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref>.
activity is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).
Gets or sets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> points to.
The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> points to.
Occurs when you attempt to set this value when the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> is not in design mode.
Gets or sets the path for a member of the target activity.
The value can use dotted notation to indicate a path to a nested value.

For example, a path of "A.B.C" indicates that the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> is to a field or property named 'C', which is a member of the field or property 'B', which in turn is a field or property 'A', which is a member of the target activity.
This property cannot be set at run time.
The path of the data item of interest on the chosen <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
Occurs when you attempt to set this value when the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind"></xref> is not in design mode.
Returns the current instance of this class.
An <xref href="System.IServiceProvider"></xref>.
The current instance of this class.
Sets the run-time value.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> owning this bind.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to set the run-time value to.
activity is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).

Calculates and returns a combination of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind.Name"></xref> and <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind.Path"></xref> property strings.
A combination of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind.Name"></xref> and <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityBind.Path"></xref> property strings.
Gets an <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> of user data relating to this instance.
An <xref href="System.Collections.IDictionary"></xref> of user data relating to this instance.
